name: Movement VI: Eulogy
description:
In memory of Charlie Schulz

SUICIDE HOTLINE: 800-273-8255

https://suicidepreventionlifeline.org/

In February of 2019, my best friend Charlie took his own life. In the months leading up to it, he and I had begun working on a game together, but due to a busy college schedule and lack of funds, we had to put it on the backburner.

In his memory, I think it's time to finish that game. Charlie was insistent that "if anything bad ever happens to one of us, the other's gotta finish it."

I've attempted to start this project a number of times, under different names and perspectives, but the only way this feels right is to speak to my own experiences with grieving for him, while also presenting his vision to the best of my ability. The Drowning Machine is the culmination of this project, with Eulogy being the first of many excerpts creating a larger story. 

Eulogy was created in 3 hours, using poetry written by Charlie that he provided before his passing. 

Profit from The Drowning Machine will be donated to a Trans Lifeline in Charlie's honor

Join The Warren, the official Rabbit Run Games Discord: https://discord.gg/qYgSV2QZ

Follow me on Twitter for regular updates: https://Twitter.com/RabbitRunDev
